name: Tommy Marshall
text: I really appreciate the customer service department and all the employees that I've had the privilege to deal with at the Devan Lowe Dealership.  It is an organization that understands customer service and satisfaction I rate them at the top of the chart as far as there professionalism concern and customer service and they will do what it takes to see your needs met  in a professional manner.

text: I've only had service, not sales, and have Bennett pleased until I made an appointment on the Cadillac app, and they were not connected so I had no appointment. But they took me in and did the service.
